title: Premier League total broadcasting payments to clubs 2010 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Broadcasting payments in million GBP, containing a total of 9 data points.
Overall Broadcasting payments in million GBP has increased over the Year.

Broadcasting payments in million GBP is roughly constant from 2010/11 to 2012/13, gradually increasing from 2012/13 to 2013/14, roughly constant from 2013/14 to 2015/16, gradually increasing from 2015/16 to 2016/17, and finally roughly constant from 2016/17 to 2018/19.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015/16 and 2016/17.
The highest Broadcasting payments in million GBP, of value 2456.01 was reached at Year 2018/19
Minimum Broadcasting payments in million GBP about 953.0 was reached at Year 2010/11
